data.title: 47.8 Acres of Agricultural Land with Home for Sale in Stephenville, Texas
data.meta_description: This rural residential and agricultural 47.84-acre property for sale in Erath County, TX features equestrian opportunities and ranching possibilities and includes a 4,232 square foot house with farmland.
data.text: Welcome to your opportunity to own a piece of countryside paradise! This 1973 ranch house nestled on 47 sprawling acres boasts scenic views and endless possibilities. Featuring 5 bedrooms and 2.5 baths, this charming home offers ample space for family living or hosting guests. The property's unique features include dairy barn amenities, with 3 TCEQ registered lagoons, offering potential for various business ventures. Whether you dream of operating a dairy farm, a winery, cultivating a hobby farm, or transforming the land into a cattle or horse property, the choice is yours. In addition to the main residence, multiple outhouses and buildings will convey with the property if purchased before May 30th, providing a turnkey opportunity to kickstart your entrepreneurial endeavors. Don't miss out on this rare chance to create the rural lifestyle you've always imagined. Embrace the tranquility of country living while exploring the potential for business ventures on this fantastic property.
